title: Where Angels Fear To Tread
lyrics:
Fools rush in
Where angels fear to tread
And so I come to you my love
My heart above my head
Fools rush in
Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head



Fools rush in

Where wise men never go

But wise men never fall in love

So how are they to know



When we met

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head

When we met

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head



Fools rush in

Where wise men never go

But wise men never fall in love

So how are they to know

Oh, oh, oh, oh



When we met

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head

Fools rush in

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head



Care, fool, fool

Care, fool



Fools rush in

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head



Fools rush in

Where angels fear to tread

And so I come to you my love

My heart above my head
